title:
Who is the man dressed up as a clown driving a pick up truck I periodically see around 5pm weekdays when I am driving home from work on Covil Farm Road?



(I initially thought I was crazy or having some sort of focal brain problem, but have seen this man multiple times in a gray truck with clown face paint.  He is driving west when I am driving east and with the sunset I can see his painted face clear as day.  Chuck E Cheese, Clown for Hire?  This is on weekdays so what clown would go to work at 5pm on weekdays.  If you find an answer, please also email it to me.  I hate questioning my sanity.)
